title: Recommendations for metallic information technology cables

content.text: Metallic information technology cables should not be installed on overhead high-voltage (> AC 1 000 V,  DC 1 500 V) power supply infrastructures.

requirements.text: Metallic information technology cables should not be installed on overhead high-voltage (> AC 1 000 V,  DC 1 500 V) power supply infrastructures.
